short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free PDF Software to Edit, Convert, Sign & More. Integrated with Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DeftPDF - A Reliable, intuitive and productive PDF software.
Edit, Convert, Fill, Compress, Merge, Split, Translate your PDF files. 

★ Power-up your productivity by adding DeftPDF to Chrome! Works in the browser, without installing extra software.

★ Compress your PDF right inside your Gmail. 

★ PDF Tools and PDF Converters: 
- PDF Editor
- Reduce the size of your PDF
- Merge, Split and Extract PDF Pages
- Rotate and Delete PDF Pages
- Fill and Sign and Send PDFs for Signature (PDF Filler)
- Protect and Unlock PDF
- Bates Numbering PDF
- Crop
- Grayscale
- Add Header & Footer to PDF
- N-up
- Watermark
- PDF / Word File Translation
- Invoice Generator 

★ Converter
- From PDF to Word, Excel, PPT, JPG, TXT, EPUB
- Word, JPG, PNG, HTML, PPT, EPUB to PDF

★ How to use the DeftPDF Chrome Extension:
1. Search the tool you want to use and open the tool page
2. Upload PDF file (uploaded locally or Google Drive)
3. Make the change
4. Wait for your file to be processed 
5. Download your new file

★ With DeftPDF you can process numerous file types:
- PDF
- Microsoft Office: Docx, Doc, Excel, PPT
- Images: JPG, PNG, TIFF
- Scans: OCR is available to extract data from PDFs into editable documents

Please contact us at support@deftpdf.com if you have any issue
